com.mirasense.scanditsdk.interfaces
Interface ScanditSDKOverlay

public interface ScanditSDKOverlay

Interface of all the possible customization options for the standard GUI which is displayed on top of the video feed running the recognition. Copyright 2011 Mirasense AG. All rights reserved.

Method Summary

Method Detail

showSearchBar

void showSearchBar(boolean show)
Adds (or removes) a search bar to the top of the scan screen.

Parameters:
show - True if a search bar should be shown. Default is false.

showTitleBar

void showTitleBar(boolean show)
Deprecated. This method is retained for use with the old GUI which is superseeded by the new 3.0 GUI that does not have a title bar anymore.

Adds (or removes) the title bar at the top of the scan screen.

Parameters:
show - True if a title bar should be shown. Default is true.

showToolBar

void showToolBar(boolean show)
Deprecated. This method is retained for use with the old GUI which is superseeded by the new 3.0 GUI that does not have a tool bar anymore.

Adds (or removes) the tool bar at the bottom of the scan screen.

Parameters:
show - True if a tool bar should be shown. Default is true.

showMostLikelyBarcodeUIElement

void showMostLikelyBarcodeUIElement(boolean show)
Deprecated. This method serves no purpose anymore and will not be replaced.

Add the 'most likely barcode' UI element. This element is displayed below the viewfinder when the barcode engine is not 100% confident in its result and asks for user confirmation. This element is seldom displayed - typically only when decoding challenging barcodes with fixed focus cameras.

Parameters:
show - True if the 'most likely barcode' UI element should be shown. Default is true.

resetGUI

void resetGUI()
Resets the scan screen user interface to its initial state.

setInfoBannerY

void setInfoBannerY(float y)
Sets the y coordinate of the info banner relative to the screen height. The info banner contains the 'powered by Scandit' logo and the 'most likely barcode' UI element if it is enabled.

Parameters:
offset - The banner's y coordinate relative to the screen size. Default is 0.7.

setViewfinderDimension

void setViewfinderDimension(float width,
                            float height)
Sets te size of the viewfinder relative to the size of the screen size in portrait mode. Changing this value does not(!) affect the area in which barcodes are successfully recognized. It only changes the size of the box drawn onto the scan screen.

Parameters:
width - The viewfinder's width relative to the screen width in portrait mode. Default is 0.6.
height - The viewfinder's height relative to the screen height in portrait mode. Default is 0.25.

drawViewfinderTextHook

void drawViewfinderTextHook(boolean draw)
Sets whether to draw the hook at the top of the viewfinder that displays text.

Parameters:
draw - True if the hook should be drawn. Default is true.

setBeepEnabled

void setBeepEnabled(boolean enabled)
Enables or disables the sound when a code was recognized. If the phone's ring volume is muted, no beep will be played regardless of the value.

Parameters:
enabled - True if the engine should beep. Default is true.

setVibrateEnabled

void setVibrateEnabled(boolean enabled)
Enables or disables the vibration when a code was recognized. If vibrate is disabled in the phone's settings, no vibration will occur regardless of the value.

Parameters:
enabled - True if the engine should vibrate. Default is true.

setTorchEnabled

void setTorchEnabled(boolean enabled)
Enables or disables the icon that let's the user activate the LED torch mode. If the device does not support torch mode, the icon to activate is will not be visible regardless of the value.

Parameters:
enabled - True if torch mode should be available. Default is true.

setTorchOnImage

void setTorchOnImage(Bitmap image)
Sets the image of the torch mode toggle button for when the torch mode is activated.

Parameters:
image - The new image.

setTorchOffImage

void setTorchOffImage(Bitmap image)
Sets the image of the torch mode toggle button for when the torch mode is deactivated.

Parameters:
image - The new image.

setTextForInitialScanScreenState

void setTextForInitialScanScreenState(java.lang.String text)
Sets the text that will be displayed above the viewfinder to tell the user to align it with the barcode that should be recognized.

Parameters:
text - The new text. Default is "Align code with box".

setTextForBarcodePresenceDetected

void setTextForBarcodePresenceDetected(java.lang.String text)
Sets the text that will be displayed above the viewfinder to tell the user to align it with the barcode and hold still because a potential code seems to be on the screen.

Parameters:
text - The new text. Default is "Align code and hold still".

setTextForBarcodeDecodingInProgress

void setTextForBarcodeDecodingInProgress(java.lang.String text)
Sets the text that will be displayed above the viewfinder to tell the user to hold still because a barcode is aligned with the box and the recognition is trying to recognize it.

Parameters:
text - The new text. Default is "Decoding ...".

setSearchBarPlaceholderText

void setSearchBarPlaceholderText(java.lang.String text)
Sets the text shown in the manual entry field when nothing has been entered yet.

Parameters:
message - The new title message. Default is "Scan barcode or enter it here".

setSearchBarKeyboardType

void setSearchBarKeyboardType(int inputType)
Sets the type of keyboard that is shown when entering characters into the search bar. This does not change the legacy keyboard which is always set to numbers only.

Parameters:
inputType - The new keyboard type. Default is InputType.TYPE_CLASS_NUMBER

setTextForMostLikelyBarcodeUIElement

void setTextForMostLikelyBarcodeUIElement(java.lang.String text)
Deprecated. This method serves no purpose anymore and will not be replaced.

Sets the text that is displayed alongside the 'most likely barcode' UI element that is displayed when the barcode engine is not 100% confident in its result and asks for user confirmation.

Parameters:
text - The new text. Default is "Tap to use this likely number".

setTextIfNoBarcodeWasRecognized

void setTextIfNoBarcodeWasRecognized(java.lang.String text)
Deprecated. This method serves no purpose anymore and will not be replaced.

Sets the text that is displayed if the engine was unable to recognize the barcode.

Parameters:
text - The new text. Default is "No barcode recognized".

setTextToSuggestManualEntry

void setTextToSuggestManualEntry(java.lang.String text)
Deprecated. This method serves no purpose anymore and will not be replaced.

Sets the text that is displayed if the engine was unable to recognize the barcode and it is suggested to enter the barcode manually.

Parameters:
text - The new text. Default is "Enter barcode via keypad".

setTitleMessage

void setTitleMessage(java.lang.String message)
Deprecated. 

Sets the title shown at the top of the screen.

Parameters:
message - The new title message. Default is "Scan a barcode".

setLeftButtonCaption

void setLeftButtonCaption(java.lang.String caption)
Deprecated. 

Sets the caption of the left button.

Parameters:
caption - The new button caption. Default is "KEYPAD".

setLeftButtonCaptionWhenKeypadVisible

void setLeftButtonCaptionWhenKeypadVisible(java.lang.String caption)
Deprecated. 

Sets the caption of the left button when the keypad is visible.

Parameters:
caption - The new button caption. Default is "OK".

setRightButtonCaption

void setRightButtonCaption(java.lang.String caption)
Deprecated. 

Sets the caption of the right button.

Parameters:
caption - The new button caption. Default is "CANCEL".

setRightButtonCaptionWhenKeypadVisible

void setRightButtonCaptionWhenKeypadVisible(java.lang.String caption)
Deprecated. 

Sets the caption of the right button when the keypad is visible.

Parameters:
caption - The new button caption. Default is "CANCEL".

setViewfinderColor

void setViewfinderColor(float r,
                        float g,
                        float b)
Sets the color of the viewfinder when no code has been recognized yet.

Parameters:
r - The red component between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 1.0.
g - The green component between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 1.0.
b - The blue component between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 1.0.

setViewfinderDecodedColor

void setViewfinderDecodedColor(float r,
                               float g,
                               float b)
Sets the color of the viewfinder once the barcode has been recognized.

Parameters:
r - The red component between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 0.0.
g - The green component between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 1.0.
b - The blue component between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 0.0.

addListener

void addListener(ScanditSDKListener listener)
Adds a ScanDKListener.

Parameters:
listener - A new listener to add.

removeListener

void removeListener(ScanditSDKListener listener)
Removes a ScanDKListener.

Parameters:
listener - A listener to remove.

removeAllListenes

void removeAllListenes()
Removes all registered listeners.
